## Goal
What should be improved and why.

## Proposed change
Describe the change in detail.

## Scope
Which component(s) does this affect?
- [ ] alacritty
- [ ] fish
- [ ] starship
- [ ] niri
- [ ] noctalia
- [ ] gtk

- [ ] vim
- [ ] other (specify)

## Portability considerations
Confirm the change is safe for public repos and portable across machines:
- No secrets (tokens, cookies, keys)
- No machine-specific IDs or state
- No frequently-changing autogenerated files

## Alternatives
Any alternative approaches considered.

Links, screenshots, or examples.
